messages.message: Awesome our golden tests caught this ahead of uat!! Nice job David, karthik and anyone else who worked on the golden tests! And will for running them :)
Seems like the new difference is something OCR related — is this the kind of thing that we’d update the base for, or is it something we want to investigate?
investigate — OCR with the same settings shouldn’t spit out different results (else we’ll break our customers flows downstream / our own demos + solutions).
